oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grand Army of the Republic (GAR) certificate of J. W. Oliver
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certificate from the Grand Army of the Republic presented to J. W. Oliver, appointing him Aide-de-Camp. John Olliver served with Co. F, 4th Tenn. Inf. USA, and is father of donor. This unit was composed of Unionist men exiled from Confederate-controlled East Tennessee who mustered in at Nashville. They served in middle Tennessee and, later in the war, in the eastern part of the state.
